name: "Psychedelic Thug (Animated)" by Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)
description:
[Liner pen on notebook page with digital embellishments, color, and moshing!] Part of Robespierre's practice of worshipping his Wooden God is the consumption of certain "mind expanding" substances, which allow direct communication with his deity of choice! ---Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)

[P.S. - This is piece #3 in a 4 part series of cross-chain artworks based on the same notebook drawing! Seek out the other works on the HIVE and ETHEREUM chains!]
